column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The skillets seemed to be a popular dish among other customers so I decided to give them a try. I ordered the "butcher block" skillet and it was amazing and full of flavor. The skillets come with pancakes but you can substitute French toast or crepes for a small up charge. Although the wait was pretty long
column2: the shopping on nearby State Street made it go by pretty fast. Â The App and text message wait list keep you up to date on your place in line. Once seated
column3: the service is fast. With that being said
column4: it was well worth the wait. Great place and a must try!
